---
title: "Soviet Missiles Turned Away"
---

The USSR has decided to recall all missiles from Cuba.
Kennedy scores a diplomatic victory and nuclear war is averted!

* President Kennedy Player: Add a payoff of 10 to your total payoff.

* Premier Khrushchev player:

  + Add a payoff of 5 to your total payoff if you are a Dove.

  + Add a payoff of 0 to your total payoff if you are a Madman.

Record your strategies and payoffs.

  * Kruschev player may optionally reveal their hidden type.

  * Discuss each of your strategies in the game. 
  Make sure you get your classmate's actual name.

  * If necessary, revise your plan of action.

  * Then find a new opponent and play the game again.
